      • microsecondPerQuaterNote

        public static byte[] microsecondPerQuaterNote(int bpm)
        Returns the value of the tempo in microseconds per quarter-note. This is used by the midi format.
        Parameters:
        bpm - the tempo is bit per minute
        Returns:
        the ready to use array for the midi format
